thread.title: BRIEF-Sinclair Pharma Says To Regain US Distribution Rights For 3 Products

title: BRIEF-Sinclair Pharma Says To Regain US Distribution Rights For 3 Products
text: March 26, 2018 / 6:40 AM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Sinclair Pharma Says To Regain US Distribution Rights For 3 Products Reuters Staff March 26 (Reuters) - Sinclair Pharma Plc: * UPDATE ON US DISTRIBUTION OF SILHOUETTE INSTALIFT * CONFIRMS IT WILL REGAIN FULL US DISTRIBUTION RIGHTS FOR SILHOUETTE INSTALIFT, SILHOUETTE REFINE AND SILHOUETTE LIFTÂ® ON 31 MARCH 2018 * IN ADVANCED DISCUSSIONS TO SECURE NEW DISTRIBUTION AGREEMENT FOR SILHOUETTE INSTALIFT IN US * IN ADVANCED DISCUSSIONS FOR AN EXTENDED DEBT FACILITY WHICH MANAGEMENT EXPECTS TO PROVIDE GREATER FLEXIBILITY THAN CURRENT ARRANGEMENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
